```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dint)
```


```{r}

td <- list(
  seq(date_yq(2010, 1), date_yq(2020, 2)),
  seq(date_yq(1900, 1), date_yq(2020, 2)),
  seq(date_yq(2002, 3), date_yq(2003, 3)),
  seq(date_yq(2002, 3), date_yq(2002, 4))
)


plotf <- function(.x){
  ggplot(
    data.frame(
      xval = .x,
      yval = 2L
    ),
    aes(
      x = xval,
      y = yval
    )
  ) + scale_x_discrete(breaks = date_yq_breaks(), labels = format_yq_short, limits = c(min(.x), max(.x)))
}



p <- plotf(td[[1]])
class(p)
print(p)
p

lapply(td, plot)


```
